Financials_Business_Process_Parameters.description: When set to "true" or "1", the business process is automatically processed. This means that all approvals will be automatically approved in the system, all reviews and to-do's will be automatically by-passed, and all notifications will be automatically suppressed.

Business_Process_Comment_Data.description: Free form comment regarding the business process.

validation.validation: This Business Process has been configured to disable comment. Please remove the comment or change the setting in the Business Process Policy or tenant setup.

validation.validation: The Quantity Picked ([picked]) cannot be greater than the Quantity Allocated ([allocated]) on a Directed Pick List (line [line]).
The provided Inventory Item [item] does not match the item on the pick list line ([line]).
The provided Unit of Measure [uom] does not match the unit of measure on the pick list line ([line]).
The provided Item Lot [lot] does not match the lot on the pick list line ([line]).
Duplicate serial numbers are not allowed.
The quantity picked can't exceed zero as Zero On Hand is selected on the picking list line ([LINE]).
The provided Supplier [supplier] does not match the supplier on the pick list line ([line]).
The provided Inventory Location [location] does not match the location on the pick list line ([line]).
